questions.question: Which trigonometric ratio is defined as the length of the opposite side divided by the hypotenuse?

choices: Find the square root of the longest side
Divide the base by the height

Data that can be counted and has a finite number of possible values (like the number of students) is called:

choices: Number of rooms in a house
The weight of a residential building material
Number of chairs in a room
Count of cars in a garage
questions.correctAnswer: The weight of a residential building material
